articles.description: A major parcel delivery company has today confirmed that some customer parcels were being left outside of depots due to backlogs.
articles.content:
A major parcel delivery company has today confirmed that some customer parcels were being left outside of depots due to backlogs.

articles.title: Surrey power cuts mean some could miss start of England v France World Cup game - Surrey Live
articles.description: Just 15 customers are now affected in areas such as Guildford, Woking and Walton
articles.content: A number of power cuts are affecting homes in Surrey today (Saturday, December 10) amid freezing temperatures across the county. Operator UK Power Networks is reporting problems in a number of differ… [+966 chars]
